ComicInfo.Title: Nightmare On Memory Lane
ComicInfo.Summary:
DEADPOOL VS. SABRETOOTH STARTS NOW!
Deadpool has no idea that he killed his own parents. SHHH! Don't tell! Only problem is...he's investigating whodunit, swearing vengeance. Don't worry! He thinks SABRETOOTH did it! This is gonna be a fun fight.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Mike Allred & Laura Allred | 1 | Var | Women of Power Variant Cover | Annie Wu | 3 | Var | #SecretComic Variant Cover | Gerry Duggan (w), Scott Koblish (a), Guru-eFX (c) & Joe Sabino (l) | 2 | Var | The Story Thus Far... Variant Cover | Mike Hawthorne & Jordie Bellaire | 4 | Var | Classic Variant Cover | Howard Chaykin & Jesus Aburtov | 5 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:11:05. [CVDB517827]

ComicInfo.Characters: Deadpool, Foolkiller (Salinger), Madcap, Magneto, Masacre, Sabretooth, Scott Adsit, Slapstick, Solo, Stingray, Terror Inc
